FilterRule * m_rule

Detailed Description

A FindProvider is used to access the first row of a child provider which match a criterion specified in a filter rule.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FindProvider::FindProvider (   ) 
 

FindProvider::FindProvider (  Provider *  provider,
FilterRule *  rule,
INT  columnid = 0
) 
 

On construction the following parameters have to be specified: provider: The provider which should be filtered. rule: Specify how the rows are filtered. columnid: Specify on which columnid rule has to be applied.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN FindProvider::DeleteAllRows (  ProviderListener *  listener = 0  )  [virtual]
 

DeleteAllRows deletes the found row of the child-provider. Returns FALSE if no child-provider was set.

void FindProvider::OnExecutingListener (  Provider *  provider = 0  )  [virtual]
 

Called by DelegationProviderListener to modify the progress value. The current version reflects the progress value of the child-provider until 99 percent.

Reimplemented from AbstractDelegationProvider.
